CustomField.formula: IF(!ISBLANK(Chemical_Used__c), "Chemical: " & Chemical_Used__c & BR(), "") & IF(!ISBLANK(Active_Ingredients__c), "Active Ingredient: " & Active_Ingredients__c & " (" & Active_Ingredient_Percentage__c & ")" & BR(), "") & IF(!ISBLANK(P_C_P__c), "PCP #: " & P_C_P__c & BR(), "") & IF(!ISBLANK(Lot_Number__c), "Lot #: " & Lot_Number__c, "")
CustomField.label: Chemical Used Summary
